dt: {bc}one appointed to read to others: such as
{bc}one chosen to read aloud selected material in a Christian Science church or society
{bc}one who reads periodical literature to discover items of special interest or value
{bc}an employee who reads and records the indications of meters
{bc}a teacher's assistant who reads and marks student papers
{bc}one who reads lectures or expounds subjects to students
{bc}a device for projecting a {a_link|readable} image of a transparency
{bc}an electronic device that scans coded information (as on punch cards or bar codes) for storage or computation
{bc}a book for instruction and practice especially in {a_link|reading}
{bc}eyeglasses used for reading or close work {bc}{sx|reading glasses||}

dt.t: Gilda came back with a pair of {wi}readers{/wi} and, looking through her glasses, gave my eyelids serious consideration.

shortdef: one appointed to read to others: such as

dt: {bc}a handheld electronic device designed to be used for reading e-books and similar material

shortdef: a handheld electronic device designed to be used for reading e-books and similar material

dt: {bc}a Christian Scientist chosen to conduct meetings for a specified time and specifically to read aloud from the writings of Mary Baker Eddy

shortdef: a Christian Scientist chosen to conduct meetings for a specified time and specifically to read aloud from the writings of Mary Baker Eddy

dt: {bc}a layperson authorized to conduct parts of the church services not requiring a priest or minister

shortdef: a layperson authorized to conduct parts of the church services not requiring a priest or minister

dt: {bc}one that professes or is held to be able to perceive another's thought without normal means of communication

shortdef: one that professes or is held to be able to perceive another's thought without normal means of communication

dt: {bc}a member of a Christian Science church or society chosen for a term of office to assist the First Reader in conducting services by reading aloud selections from the Bible

shortdef: a member of a Christian Science church or society chosen for a term of office to assist the First Reader in conducting services by reading aloud selections from the Bible

dt: {bc}to read (something, such as a foreign language) or perform (music) without previous preparation or study

shortdef: to read (something, such as a foreign language) or perform (music) without previous preparation or study
to read at sight; especially : to perform music at sight
